translations: n.普及者，倡导者；大众作家；普及读物（同 popularizer）

sentences.sentence: This approach, he says without rancour, has put him at odds with conventional Joyce scholars: "No one hates a populariser more than an intellectual."
sentences.translation: 他的这种方法使得他同那些正统的乔伊斯学者分道扬镳，不过关于这一点他毫不在意。 “相对我们这样的普及者，人们更讨厌那些学者。”
